name: Bastian Void - Phonics
description:
5-TASB (5-thioasymbescaline; 3,4-diethoxy-5-methylthiophenethylamine) 

"Warm daylight, myself at age 8, sitting in computer class. Circuits and pine trees. Views out various bedroom windows. The research laboratory down the street. Atari in the basement. Wood paneling. Office buildings. Power generators sitting in the forest. Light shapes cast on walls. Science class. Old computer games. Leaves and educational video tapes."

<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/8065657&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Sima Kim - Whatever
description:
DOEF (2,5-dimethoxy-4-(2-fluoroethyl)-amphetamine) 

Delicate post-classical piano ambience from South Korean musicologist Sima Kim. Includes re-workings from Wil Bolton and Hakobune.

<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/playlists/8065649&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Alex Ketzer – Falling Off Remixes 12″
description:
The Falling Off EP was originally released on tape back in 2012 by the Noorden label and now the remixed version gets a limited 12" release on their more dance orientated offshoot Leg Spin.  Remixes come courtesy of Lab Matix, Baumfreund, maryLA and Wenzel, with each producer adding their own unique twist to the original versions.  Pressed onto transparent blue marbled vinyl and enveloped in screenprinted cover this really is a thing of beauty.

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/96744483&show_artwork=false"></iframe>

name: Ondness – Pelas Margens
description: Following on from his cassingle with Adventures in Dubbing, Ondness makes his debut on the Noorden label with the five-track-EP Pelas Margens. The productions are dark, atmospheric and utterly enthralling.

name: Meth Dad - Posi Vibes
description: Everything about this release from Meth Dad is perfect, from the cartoon Santa riding a dolphin on the cover to the exquisite electronic pop music held within the transparent green tape. Austin based label Graveyard Orbit have clearly put a lot of thought and effort into this limited edition C34 and it certainly shows.

name: The Smoke Clears - Listen
Yard - In Waiting
Vales - Letter Beacons
Isolde Touch - Polyvalence
Adventures in Dubbing presents Baseball Cap
description:
In a diamond shaped arena a single man with a stick stands over a pentagon while two men in armor stand behind it. One lanky gentleman commands his army from the front as he stands atop a white rectangle positioned in front of the pentagon. The gentleman on top of the white rectangle hurls a leather wrapped sphere that travels faster than a car through the air, the single sticked man, swings his wooden club toward the fast moving ball and makes contact. Throughout the stadium the contact with the bat and ball is heard relative to your distance from the contact. Many witnesses and participators in this ritual wear a baseball cap on their head. This cap is said to shade their eyes from the sun and allow for proper thinking.

<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Fplaylists%2F10512640"></iframe>

name: Birkhouse Recordings - BIRK.005
description:
Hard to believe that Birkhouse Recordings are onto tape number five already, this time it's a split 11 track cassette featuring Blue Cube & Curt.  They've managed to create a stunning mix of atmospheric electronics and broken beats with Blue Cube using only non musical 'found sound' samples as source material.  As with previous cassettes this a limited edition release and if you've got any sense you'll snap it up quick.

<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Fplaylists%2F9111378"></iframe>

name: Homocide McBride "RUFF JAMZ II" Mix Tape
description: To celebrate "Cassette Store Day", Homicide McBride delivers the second part in the Ruff Jamz series as a mix tape. Sixty minutes of special edits blended together onto a bi-colour blue and yellow cassette tape packaged with "Murder Is My Beat" sticker. Strictly limited to 100 copies galaxy wide and sealed with love from Roar Groove.

name: Dr Guilty – Caged Panoramas
description:
Next up on Elephant Recordings, Italy’s Gabriele Quartero, delivers four tracks of stunning beauty recorded on C42 green cassette tape. Gabriele’s emotion cuts through this release, and pulls the listener ever deeper into a wonderfully textured soundscape.

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F91850478&secret_token=s-BSjAB"></iframe>

name: Valanx – Through Stygian Forests
description:
The third release on Elephant Recordings features Arne Weinberg in his Valanx guise on solid black C60 cassette tape. This album encapsulates the dark and foreboding world of the uncertain. Continually unsettling, it darkens the soul.

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F90004485&secret_token=s-NpKnK"></iframe>

name: Ian Martin – The Wanderer
description:
For the second tape release on Elephant Recordings, Ian Martin features with 6 tracks dubbed onto grey C50 cassette tape with inlay artwork from Ian himself. This release is one of a darker realm, music which allows thoughts to wander and permeate the deeper recesses of ones mind. 

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F87550624"></iframe>

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F87548869"></iframe>

name: x.Lean.x - 4am
description:
x.Lean.x returns to the Noorden label for the follow up to 'Paradxse', his debut cassette release.  While '4am' keeps up the raw and dirty atmosphere of its predecessor, there's also a noticeable sophistication to his new productions. Over the course of nine tracks x.Lean.x uses punchy kicks, drawn-out synths, pitched down vocals and dreamy melodies to create the perfect mix, best enjoyed at 4:00 AM of course...

<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Fplaylists%2F7880807"></iframe>

name: Birkhouse Recordings - BIRK.004
description:
Birkhouse Recordings are back with tape number four which continues the high standard we've come to expect from one of the best new labels out there.  Each side of this limited edition cassette takes the form of a continual mix with Loftmind on the a side and Aimmar Cair on the b side.  

A digital download code is included with each tape so even if your Walkman breaks down you'll still be able to enjoy it.

<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Fplaylists%2F7390555"></iframe>

name: Crescent - IRL EP
description:
Leon Crescent [a.k.a. Crescent] is a young man from Melbourne who made his way onto This Thing's roster of talented producers following a slew of unsolicited emails.

With 'IRL' Leon delivers a four track EP of lo-fi juke influenced breaks and beats and a rework of Kanye's 'Mercy' that sounds like it was beamed in from hyperspace.

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F89089081"></iframe>

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F85892545"></iframe>

name: Thomas William - Deccan Technicolour
description:
Previously working under the moniker Cleptoclectics producer Tom Smith is now going by the much easier to pronounce handle Thomas William.  'Deccan Technicolour' is his first release since the name change and it's a breath-taking piece of work.  This is an album teeming with lopsided beats, glitchy grooves, ingeniously butchered samples, and woozy, psychedelic soundscapes.

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F26270419"></iframe>

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F26270844"></iframe>

name: Worship - Close Encounter EP
description:
Close Encounter is the EP from Swiss producer Worship.  Originally conceived as a two track single  Close Encounter grew into a five track EP with four original tracks and a remix courtesy of Auxiliary Tha Master Fader.

Close Encounter is a trip on cosmic waves in tropical surroundings, lead by Worship’s magic synthesizers. Musically speaking, he was inspired by everything from Abba to Frank Zappa. Nevertheless, the result is a rendezvous of italo & space disco, retro instrumentals with an air of mystery.

<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Fplaylists%2F5689117"></iframe>

name: x.Lean.x - Paradxse
description:
Armed with nothing but a Roland Sampler, 16 year old Anthony aka x.Lean.x paints vivid nostalgic pictures filled with visions of late nights in dark cities. x.Lean.x's first EP Paradxse is build around a raw and dirty kind of street-sampling mixed with a big touch of warmness and some shuffled’n’shreddered beats and breaks.

<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Fplaylists%2F4310644"></iframe>

name: Wet Play Tape-Cast #2 - Ruf Dug's Fruity Punch
description:
More cassette tape goodness from the Wet Play crew, this time it's Ruf Dug at the controls laying down 60 minutes of raw house, techno and acid. 

There's no preview available for this cassette but it does feature this absolute classic from Tyree

<iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/b9wjSwGQwCQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: Birkhouse Recordings - BIRK.001
description:
BIRK.001, the debut release on the Birkhouse Recordings label, is a C60 compilation featuring eleven tracks of astonishing music, that switches effortlessly from blissed out electronica to jazzy breaks and beyond. 

The shift between genres is never a distraction though as the music ebbs and flows creating an emotional pull that is hard to resist.

Like all the best labels Birkhouse also have a great aesthetic, creating artwork that perfectly complements the music contained within.

<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="http://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Fplaylists%2F2871975&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Adventures in Dubbing Presents Scratchandsniff
description:
This is the first release on Adventures in Dubbing which is a cassette only label I've set up to showcase some of the talented producers I write about on my Adventures in Disco blog. 

Glasgow based edit machine Scratchandsniff is at the controls for the first cassette and he's put together two fantastic edits neither of which are available as downloads.  Both tracks are supremely funky with the psychedelic flourishes of Flash on the A side and the suitably Afro tinged Shaft in Africa on the B side.  As if that wasn't enough there's also some bespoke artwork from Baltimore illustrator Donald Ely which I think really captures the essence of this release.  Each cassette also comes with a sticker of the artwork.

There are only a hundred copies of this available, once they're sold out that's it.

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="http://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F37800403&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="http://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F37894391&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: 'Mixtape' earrings by Dead Envy
description:
These ‘Mixtape’ earrings from DEAD ENVY Ink. fuse retro and vintage perfectly.

Eye-catching cassette charms in vintage bronze – the perfect gift for any lady (or gent) with an eye for fashion and a penchant for the physical format.
They come in two versions – hook only, or on a chain.

Hook
The tape charms are hung on 18mm bronze ear wires and measure 20 x 10mm.

Hook & Chain
The tape charms are hung on 45mm chains connected to 18mm bronze ear wires and measure 20 x 10mm – making the whole earring approx 80mm in length.
